table.result: Husky Wand: Just a log that can be weilded as a two handed wand
Tome of infinite Tomes: Buyer beware, this tome is just a blank book
Ring of Wrapping: Makes the wearer an expert in all things related to wrapping.
Trickshot Bow: The equipable hair bow enables the user to make shots no other could make at a distance of 10 ft.
Potion of Site: A beautifully crafted miniature scene of a location, not to be confused with "sight"

Handlers Pen: A magical Mystical Object of Splendor and mystery, The sounds... wait sounds? This is a Pen? No it's a Pen not a Pen Pen... You know it keeps animals out, What do you think Handler's use pens for?
Scroll of Weekness: A scroll that has some oddly scribbled spells on it. Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday
Horn of Horn: When activated it summons four two legged horns that ram enemies at a rate of 1d6-5x4. Cannot discern living from inanimate.
Potion of Fazing: Wizards from all around want this Potion! Bandits would steal for this Potion! If only it was the Potion of "Phasing" and not so disturbing
Wand of levitation: Instructions are attached "Step 1: find water... Step 2:... "
Poachers Bow: Why you would use a bow to make poached eggs, no-one knows, but it makes damn fine poached eggs. +5 to cooking checks on poached eggs.
Elixir of Resounding Invisibility: Renders the imbiber invisible while they are yelling. Lasts 1 minute/5 minutes/10 minutes/1 day/1 week/forever (1d6 to determine quality).
Cloak of Inn Visability: While wearing the cloak, all inns, taverns, bars, pubs, and saloons give off a glow that is visable from a mile away and can be seen through anything
Boots of Pace: When worn by anyone these boots auto magically make the wearer (and any other creatures in a 69,420 mile radius) increase their speed by 30 feet
Ring of Warmth: The ring is warm to the touch and that's it.
Deck of One Thing: It's a functioning Deck of Many Things except every card is The Idiot.
Rogue Armor: A set of animated armor that likes to move only when being worn

Bagpipes of invisibility: As long as these bagpipes are being played, the player is completely invisible. Cannot be muffled/silenced. +10 to stealth checks, all hostile and friendly entities in a 30 ft radius gain +10 to perception checks.
Infinite Rope: A 5 foot loop of rope.
The All-or-Nothing Coin: A coin that, while in your possession is worth 1gp. But when out of your possession is worth nothing.

Sword in stone : The Fabled holy weapon!!! It's here! You truly are embued with a sense of awe! You reach for the sacred weapon... only to find that it's just a sword, made of Stone "Sword in Stone"...  Roll 20 for perception check -19 modifier
